item.title: Bob Marley & The Wailers - Lively Up Yourself - Key of C
item.description:
Ukulele Play Along - Very Easy
Lively Up Yourself - Bob Marley
This is one of the first songs we learn and the ukuleles in the video match the colour of the chords we use (Rainbow method).
In the Key Of C Maj
Using the chords: C F
Suggested Strum Patterns: D D D D or a back beat strum
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Bob Marley & The Wailers - Exodus - Key of Am
item.description:
For educational use.
As performed by Bob Marley & the Wailers Source video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ImQewFMzIzI
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Paolo Nutini - 10-Oct - Key of C
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Very Easy
10/10 - Paolo Nutini (from his 2009 album Sunny Side Up)
Using the chords: C F G7 - You can replace G7 with G if you wish.
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU or D DU D DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Three Little Birds Ukulele Play Along - Very Easy - Key of C
item.description:
Ukulele play along
A very easy version of 3 Little Birds. This is one of the first songs we learn and the ukuleles in the video match the colour of the chords we use (Rainbow method).
Three Little Birds by Bob Marley but this version is recorded by John Vettel.
In the Key Of C Maj
Using the chords: C F G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D D D D or D DU U DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: MAGIC! - Rude - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C. Transposed down a half step from the original song.
As performed by Magic.
Need to practice at a different tempo? Use the gear icon in the video (lower right) to slow down (or speed up) the tempo at pitch! Need to do so on an iPad or iPhone? Check out the browser called "iCab Mobile" which has a Module called "Video Playback Rate"
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
The colored font matches Aquila KIDS ukulele strings.
This version matches the educational Color Chord approach and uses four chords: C (red sticker), G (green stickers), F (yellow stickers) and Am (blue sticker).
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Three Little Birds Ukulele Play Along - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
As performed by John Vettel (Uncle John). This video is based on a play along video by Dr. A...I wanted to use the “next chord” idea as well as to incorporate a few additional ideas. Please continue to use her resources as well! https://youtu.be/bHpjXv7Obyg
Need to practice at a different tempo? Use the gear icon in the video (lower right) to slow down (or speed up) the tempo at pitch! Need to do so on an iPad or iPhone? Check out the browser called "iCab Mobile" which has a Module called "Video Playback Rate"
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
The colored font matches Aquila KIDS ukulele strings.
This version matches the educational Color Chord approach and uses four chords: C (red sticker), G (green stickers), F (yellow stickers) and Am (blue sticker).
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.title: Bob Marley & The Wailers - Three Little Birds - Key of A
Three Little Birds (Revised) Ukulele Play Along - Key of C
item.description:
Ukulele Play Along video (This video replaces an earlier version that contained a chord mistake) Key of C Chords: C F G
Contains strumming demo
Intended for educational purposes I do not own the copyright to this music.
